TextView.android:text: 4. Blade Type on the machine screen
11. Blade Exposure (Blade Setup) -- follow the value in the cover
(Remark NA if using pre dressed blade)
14. Blade Pre-Cut board batch no. (Insert no)
15. Performed Hairline alignment during dressing. Redo until OK. Verify five lines
16. Verify Kerf width VS actual cut at Dresser board. \n[Fill in the Value] \nSpecs: Blade thickness +5um (Use DRESS parameter # 9 for Z1)
17. Perform (NCS) after dressing \n(Please do this TWICE)
19. Perform Chuck Table and Spinner Table Cleaning prior production run using oil stone
21. Perform Tape hairline alignment on affected blade only
22. Press "Inspection" button for first wafer buyoff
23. Check and fill in the wafer magazine slot number for first production wafer after changed blade.
24. 1st kerf check hairline correction \n[Insert the adjustment value]
25. Buyoff the correction for the 1st Kerf Check \n[Insert the adjustment value]
